channel.title: Peter Van Loan
channel.description: Recent news about Peter Van Loan, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Spoke at the Procedure and House Affairs committee
item.description:
on Report of the Federal Electoral Boundaries Commission for British Columbia 2012, Report ...
I'll try not to. At the outset, I want to make it clear that I'm not here as Minister Van Loan; I'm here as MP Van ...

item.title: Introduced legislation
item.description:
Government bill C-46
An Act to implement the Free Trade Agreement between Canada and the Republic of Panama, the Agreement on the Environment between Canada and the Republic of Panama and the Agreement on Labour Cooperation between Canada and the Republic of Panama
